remarks: Deduce a function's support's inclusion in another function's support. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Sep-2017.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Sep-2019.)
statement:
suppss3.1 $e |- G = ( x e. A |-> B ) $.
suppss3.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
suppss3.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. W ) $.
suppss3.2 $e |- ( ph -> F Fn A ) $.
suppss3.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A /\ ( F ` x ) = Z ) -> B = Z ) $.
suppss3 $p |- ( ph -> ( G supp Z ) C_ ( F supp Z ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d F x $.
$d Z x $.
$d ph x $.
